channel.title: Not letting me use my demote command - HELP!

item.title: Not letting me use my demote command - HELP!
item.dc:creator: @Lumby_Ride Lumby Ride
item.description:
@Lumby_Ride wrote:

Can u help me?

It says the player if either offline or is not an existing name.

This is the code im using

}else if(command.startsWith("demote") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Jamie.1")) { String name = command.substring(7); try { int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; c.playerRights = 0; c.savemoreinfo(); c.savechar(); c.disconnected = true; sendMessage(name+" is no longer a member of staff"); } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage(name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist"); } }

Read full topic
item.source: Not letting me use my demote command - HELP!
